attributes.action: Stop creating petitions for parliament to debate a new general election.
attributes.additional_details: I don’t want them to do it or listen to a tiny percentage of the population who are upset that the current government are trying to balance things up again.
attributes.background: Don’t debate a petition that brings into question the result of the recent General Election. We had 14 years of the last lot and all of a sudden the millions that voted for change are being told they made a mistake…so was Brexit but we cannot do anything about that can we….

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:  

Do Not Call a General Election - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703000
